SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_contact WHERE Contact_ID=@@Contact_ID@@,Company=@@Company@@,Contacts=@@Contacts@@,Phone=@@Phone@@,Email=@@Email@@,Matter=@@Matter@@,Wechat=@@Wechat@@,WhatsApp=@@WhatsApp@@,AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@,Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@; SELECT Contact_ID,Company,Contacts,Phone,Email,Matter,Wechat,WhatsApp,AC_Status,Processing_Result,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_contact WHERE Contact_ID=@@Contact_ID@@,Company=@@Company@@,Contacts=@@Contacts@@,Phone=@@Phone@@,Email=@@Email@@,Matter=@@Matter@@,Wechat=@@Wechat@@,WhatsApp=@@WhatsApp@@,AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@,Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@ LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ;
